verses.verse: <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is he whose <S%H6588>transgression<s%> is <S%H5375>forgiven<s%>, whose <S%H2401>sin<s%> is <S%H3680>covered<s%>.
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> unto whom the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2803>imputes<s%> not <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and in whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> there is no <S%H7423>guile<s%>.
When I kept <S%H2790>silence<s%>, my <S%H6106>bones<s%> grew <S%H1086>old<s%> through my <S%H7581>roaring<s%> all the day <S%H3117>long<s%>.

For <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> upon <S%H3955>me<s%>: my moisture is <S%H2015>turned<s%> into the <S%H2725>drought<s%> of <S%H7019>summer<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

I <S%H3045>acknowledged<s%> my <S%H2403>sin<s%> unto <S%H5771>you<s%>, and my iniquity have I not <S%H3680>hid<s%>. I <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H3034>confess<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and you <S%H5375>forgave<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of my <S%H2403>sin<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

For this shall every one that is <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto you in a <S%H6256>time<s%> when you may be <S%H4672>found<s%>: surely in the <S%H7858>floods<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> they shall not come near unto <S%H5060>him<s%>.

You are my hiding <S%H5643>place<s%>; you shall <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me from <S%H6862>trouble<s%>; you shall <S%H5437>compass<s%> me about with <S%H7438>songs<s%> of <S%H6405>deliverance<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
I will <S%H7919>instruct<s%> you and <S%H3384>teach<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> you shall <S%H3212>go<s%>: I will <S%H3289>guide<s%> you with my <S%H5869>eye<s%>.

Be you not as the <S%H5483>horse<s%>, or as the <S%H6505>mule<s%>, which have no <S%H995>understanding<s%>: whose <S%H5716>mouth<s%> must be <S%H1102>held<s%> in with <S%H4964>bit<s%> and <S%H7448>bridle<s%>, <S%H1077>lest<s%> they come near unto <S%H7126>you<s%>.
<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H4341>sorrows<s%> shall be to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>: but he that <S%H982>trusts<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H2617>mercy<s%> shall compass him <S%H5437>about<s%>.
Be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>, you <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: and <S%H7442>shout<s%> for <S%H3477>joy<s%>, all you that are upright in <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
